messages.content: 我需要获取杭州的天气信息。这是一个直接的天气查询任务，我可以使用 get_weather 工具来获取杭州当前的天气情况。

杭州当前天气情况：
- 温度：25°C
- 天气状况：晴天
- 湿度：60%

今天杭州天气不错，是晴天，温度适宜在25度，湿度也比较舒适。适合外出活动。
我需要获取所有可用的内部组件列表来回答这个问题。我可以使用 get_component_list 工具来获取完整的组件列表。

已达到最大迭代次数(10)。

我需要获取所有可用的内部组件列表来回答这个问题。我可以使用 get_component_list 工具来获取完整的组件列表。
我需要获取所有可用的内部组件列表来回答这个问题。

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { Dashboard } from '@my-corp/dashboard';\n\nconst widgets = [\n  {\n    id: 'sales-chart',\n    type: 'chart',\n    title: 'Monthly Sales',\n    dataSource: '/api/sales',\n    config: { chartType: 'line' }\n  },\n  {\n    id: 'user-stats',\n    type: 'stats',\n    title: 'Active Users',\n    dataSource: '/api/users/stats'\n  },\n  {\n    id: 'recent-orders',\n    type: 'table',\n    title: 'Recent Orders',\n    dataSource: '/api/orders/recent'\n  }\n];\n\nconst AnalyticsDashboard = () => {\n  return (\n    <Dashboard\n      widgets={widgets}\n      editable={true}\n      onLayoutChange={(layout) => saveLayout(layout)}\n      refreshInterval={30000}\n      theme=\"dark\"\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "Dashboard",

      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `type` | 'line' \\| 'bar' \\| 'pie' \\| 'scatter' \\| 'area' \\| 'heatmap' \\| 'radar' | 'line' | Chart type. |\n| `data` | ChartData | required | Chart data in standardized format. |\n| `options` | ChartOptions | - | Chart configuration options. |\n| `width` | number \\| string | '100%' | Chart width. |\n| `height` | number \\| string | 400 | Chart height. |\n| `loading` | boolean | false | Show loading state. |\n| `interactive` | boolean | true | Enable interactive features (tooltips, zoom, pan). |\n| `legend` | LegendConfig | { show: true } | Legend configuration. |\n| `axes` | AxesConfig | - | X and Y axes configuration. |\n| `colors` | string[] | - | Custom color palette. |\n| `animation` | AnimationConfig | { enabled: true } | Animation settings. |\n| `responsive` | boolean | true | Auto-resize on container size change. |\n| `onDataPointClick` | (point: DataPoint) => void | - | Callback when data point is clicked. |\n| `realTimeUpdate` | boolean | false | Enable real-time data streaming. |",

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { ChartLibrary } from '@my-corp/charts';\n\nconst SalesChart = () => {\n  const data = {\n    labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],\n    datasets: [\n      {\n        label: 'Revenue',\n        data: [12000, 19000, 15000, 25000, 22000, 30000],\n        color: '#3b82f6'\n      },\n      {\n        label: 'Expenses',\n        data: [8000, 12000, 10000, 15000, 14000, 18000],\n        color: '#ef4444'\n      }\n    ]\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <ChartLibrary\n      type=\"line\"\n      data={data}\n      height={500}\n      options={{\n        title: '2024 Financial Overview',\n        smooth: true,\n        fill: true\n      }}\n      legend={{ position: 'bottom' }}\n      onDataPointClick={(point) => showDetails(point)}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "ChartLibrary",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { FormBuilder } from '@my-corp/forms';\n\nconst userSchema = {\n  fields: [\n    {\n      name: 'firstName',\n      type: 'text',\n      label: 'First Name',\n      required: true,\n      validation: { minLength: 2 }\n    },\n    {\n      name: 'email',\n      type: 'email',\n      label: 'Email Address',\n      required: true,\n      validation: { pattern: /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/ }\n    },\n    {\n      name: 'role',\n      type: 'select',\n      label: 'Role',\n      options: ['Admin', 'User', 'Guest']\n    }\n  ]\n};\n\nconst CreateUserPage = () => {\n  return (\n    <FormBuilder\n      schema={userSchema}\n      onSubmit={(values) => createUser(values)}\n      validationMode=\"onChange\"\n      autoSave={{ enabled: true, debounce: 2000 }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "FormBuilder",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { DataGrid } from '@my-corp/ui';\n\nconst columns = [\n  { field: 'id', header: 'ID', width: 80, sortable: true },\n  { field: 'name', header: 'Name', width: 200, sortable: true, filterable: true },\n  { field: 'email', header: 'Email', width: 250 },\n  { field: 'status', header: 'Status', width: 120, filterable: true }\n];\n\nconst MyDataPage = () => {\n  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState([]);\n  \n  return (\n    <DataGrid\n      columns={columns}\n      data={users}\n      selectionMode=\"multiple\"\n      onSelectionChange={setSelectedRows}\n      virtualScroll={true}\n      pagination={{ pageSize: 50, currentPage: 1, total: 1000 }}\n      onSort={(field, direction) => console.log(field, direction)}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "DataGrid",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `nodes` | WorkflowNode[] | [] | Array of workflow nodes/steps. |\n| `edges` | WorkflowEdge[] | [] | Connections between nodes. |\n| `editable` | boolean | false | Enable workflow editing mode. |\n| `onNodeClick` | (node: WorkflowNode) => void | - | Callback when node is clicked. |\n| `onExecute` | (workflow: Workflow) => Promise<ExecutionResult> | - | Execute workflow handler. |\n| `executionHistory` | Execution[] | - | Past execution records. |\n| `validation` | ValidationConfig | - | Workflow validation rules. |\n| `nodeTypes` | NodeType[] | - | Available node types (action, decision, approval, etc.). |\n| `variables` | Variable[] | - | Workflow variables and context. |\n| `permissions` | PermissionConfig | - | User permissions for editing/executing. |\n| `autoSave` | boolean | true | Auto-save workflow changes. |",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "Workflow",
        "section": "API / Props",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { Workflow } from '@my-corp/workflow';\n\nconst ApprovalWorkflow = () => {\n  const nodes = [\n    { id: '1', type: 'start', label: 'Request Submitted' },\n    { id: '2', type: 'approval', label: 'Manager Approval', assignee: 'manager@company.com' },\n    { id: '3', type: 'decision', label: 'Budget Check', condition: 'amount > 10000' },\n    { id: '4', type: 'approval', label: 'CFO Approval', assignee: 'cfo@company.com' },\n    { id: '5', type: 'action', label: 'Process Payment', action: 'processPayment' },\n    { id: '6', type: 'end', label: 'Complete' }\n  ];\n\n  const edges = [\n    { from: '1', to: '2' },\n    { from: '2', to: '3', condition: 'approved' },\n    { from: '3', to: '4', condition: 'true' },\n    { from: '3', to: '5', condition: 'false' },\n    { from: '4', to: '5', condition: 'approved' },\n    { from: '5', to: '6' }\n  ];\n\n  return (\n    <Workflow\n      nodes={nodes}\n      edges={edges}\n      editable={true}\n      onExecute={async (workflow) => await executeWorkflow(workflow)}\n      executionHistory={pastExecutions}\n      autoSave={true}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "Workflow",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { NotificationCenter } from '@my-corp/notifications';\n\nconst App = () => {\n  const categories = [\n    { id: 'system', label: 'System', color: 'blue' },\n    { id: 'alerts', label: 'Alerts', color: 'red' },\n    { id: 'updates', label: 'Updates', color: 'green' }\n  ];\n\n  return (\n    <NotificationCenter\n      position=\"top-right\"\n      autoClose={3000}\n      categories={categories}\n      showHistory={true}\n      realTime={true}\n      onNotificationClick={(notif) => navigate(notif.link)}\n      onActionClick={(action, notif) => {\n        if (action.type === 'approve') {\n          handleApproval(notif.id);\n        }\n      }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "NotificationCenter",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",

    {
      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `columns` | Column[] | required | Column definitions including field, header, width, sortable, filterable. |\n| `data` | any[] | [] | The data array to display. |\n| `onSort` | (field: string, direction: 'asc' \\| 'desc') => void | - | Callback fired when column sort changes. |\n| `onFilter` | (filters: FilterState) => void | - | Callback fired when filters are applied. |\n| `onSelectionChange` | (selectedRows: any[]) => void | - | Callback when row selection changes. |\n| `selectionMode` | 'single' \\| 'multiple' \\| 'none' | 'none' | Row selection behavior. |\n| `virtualScroll` | boolean | false | Enable virtual scrolling for performance with large datasets. |\n| `rowHeight` | number | 48 | Height of each row in pixels. |\n| `loading` | boolean | false | Show loading overlay. |\n| `emptyState` | ReactNode | - | Custom component to show when data is empty. |\n| `pagination` | PaginationConfig | - | Pagination settings including pageSize, currentPage, total. |\n| `stickyHeader` | boolean | true | Keep header fixed while scrolling. |\n| `expandable` | ExpandableConfig | - | Configuration for expandable rows. |",

      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `position` | 'top-left' \\| 'top-right' \\| 'bottom-left' \\| 'bottom-right' | 'top-right' | Position of notification panel. |\n| `maxVisible` | number | 5 | Maximum number of visible toast notifications. |\n| `autoClose` | number | 5000 | Auto-close delay in milliseconds (0 to disable). |\n| `showHistory` | boolean | true | Show notification history panel. |\n| `categories` | Category[] | - | Notification categories for filtering. |\n| `onNotificationClick` | (notification: Notification) => void | - | Callback when notification is clicked. |\n| `onActionClick` | (action: Action, notification: Notification) => void | - | Callback for notification action buttons. |\n| `onMarkRead` | (notificationId: string) => void | - | Callback when notification is marked as read. |\n| `realTime` | boolean | true | Enable real-time notification updates. |\n| `sound` | boolean | false | Play sound on new notification. |\n| `badge` | boolean | true | Show unread count badge. |",

    {
      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `schema` | FormSchema | required | The form schema defining fields, validation, and layout. |\n| `initialValues` | Record<string, any> | {} | Initial form values. |\n| `onSubmit` | (values: any) => void \\| Promise<void> | required | Form submission handler. |\n| `onChange` | (values: any, field: string) => void | - | Called when any field value changes. |\n| `validationMode` | 'onSubmit' \\| 'onChange' \\| 'onBlur' | 'onSubmit' | When to trigger validation. |\n| `layout` | 'vertical' \\| 'horizontal' \\| 'inline' | 'vertical' | Form layout orientation. |\n| `autoSave` | AutoSaveConfig | - | Auto-save configuration with debounce time. |\n| `steps` | StepConfig[] | - | Configuration for multi-step forms. |\n| `conditionalLogic` | ConditionalRule[] | - | Rules for showing/hiding fields based on values. |\n| `submitText` | string | 'Submit' | Text for submit button. |\n| `loading` | boolean | false | Show loading state on submit button. |\n| `disabled` | boolean | false | Disable entire form. |",

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { FileUploader } from '@my-corp/ui';\n\nconst DocumentUpload = () => {\n  const handleUpload = async (files) => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    files.forEach(file => formData.append('files', file));\n    return await uploadToServer(formData);\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <FileUploader\n      accept=\".pdf,.doc,.docx\"\n      multiple={true}\n      maxSize={10485760} // 10MB\n      maxFiles={5}\n      onUpload={handleUpload}\n      onProgress={(progress) => console.log(`${progress.percent}%`)}\n      chunked={true}\n      validator={(file) => {\n        if (!file.name.match(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\\./)) {\n          return 'Filename must be alphanumeric';\n        }\n        return null;\n      }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "FileUploader",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { Dashboard } from '@my-corp/dashboard';\n\nconst widgets = [\n  {\n    id: 'sales-chart',\n    type: 'chart',\n    title: 'Monthly Sales',\n    dataSource: '/api/sales',\n    config: { chartType: 'line' }\n  },\n  {\n    id: 'user-stats',\n    type: 'stats',\n    title: 'Active Users',\n    dataSource: '/api/users/stats'\n  },\n  {\n    id: 'recent-orders',\n    type: 'table',\n    title: 'Recent Orders',\n    dataSource: '/api/orders/recent'\n  }\n];\n\nconst AnalyticsDashboard = () => {\n  return (\n    <Dashboard\n      widgets={widgets}\n      editable={true}\n      onLayoutChange={(layout) => saveLayout(layout)}\n      refreshInterval={30000}\n      theme=\"dark\"\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { ChartLibrary } from '@my-corp/charts';\n\nconst SalesChart = () => {\n  const data = {\n    labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],\n    datasets: [\n      {\n        label: 'Revenue',\n        data: [12000, 19000, 15000, 25000, 22000, 30000],\n        color: '#3b82f6'\n      },\n      {\n        label: 'Expenses',\n        data: [8000, 12000, 10000, 15000, 14000, 18000],\n        color: '#ef4444'\n      }\n    ]\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <ChartLibrary\n      type=\"line\"\n      data={data}\n      height={500}\n      options={{\n        title: '2024 Financial Overview',\n        smooth: true,\n        fill: true\n      }}\n      legend={{ position: 'bottom' }}\n      onDataPointClick={(point) => showDetails(point)}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "ChartLibrary",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { FormBuilder } from '@my-corp/forms';\n\nconst userSchema = {\n  fields: [\n    {\n      name: 'firstName',\n      type: 'text',\n      label: 'First Name',\n      required: true,\n      validation: { minLength: 2 }\n    },\n    {\n      name: 'email',\n      type: 'email',\n      label: 'Email Address',\n      required: true,\n      validation: { pattern: /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/ }\n    },\n    {\n      name: 'role',\n      type: 'select',\n      label: 'Role',\n      options: ['Admin', 'User', 'Guest']\n    }\n  ]\n};\n\nconst CreateUserPage = () => {\n  return (\n    <FormBuilder\n      schema={userSchema}\n      onSubmit={(values) => createUser(values)}\n      validationMode=\"onChange\"\n      autoSave={{ enabled: true, debounce: 2000 }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "FormBuilder",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { DataGrid } from '@my-corp/ui';\n\nconst columns = [\n  { field: 'id', header: 'ID', width: 80, sortable: true },\n  { field: 'name', header: 'Name', width: 200, sortable: true, filterable: true },\n  { field: 'email', header: 'Email', width: 250 },\n  { field: 'status', header: 'Status', width: 120, filterable: true }\n];\n\nconst MyDataPage = () => {\n  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState([]);\n  \n  return (\n    <DataGrid\n      columns={columns}\n      data={users}\n      selectionMode=\"multiple\"\n      onSelectionChange={setSelectedRows}\n      virtualScroll={true}\n      pagination={{ pageSize: 50, currentPage: 1, total: 1000 }}\n      onSort={(field, direction) => console.log(field, direction)}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "DataGrid",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",

    {
      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `nodes` | WorkflowNode[] | [] | Array of workflow nodes/steps. |\n| `edges` | WorkflowEdge[] | [] | Connections between nodes. |\n| `editable` | boolean | false | Enable workflow editing mode. |\n| `onNodeClick` | (node: WorkflowNode) => void | - | Callback when node is clicked. |\n| `onExecute` | (workflow: Workflow) => Promise<ExecutionResult> | - | Execute workflow handler. |\n| `executionHistory` | Execution[] | - | Past execution records. |\n| `validation` | ValidationConfig | - | Workflow validation rules. |\n| `nodeTypes` | NodeType[] | - | Available node types (action, decision, approval, etc.). |\n| `variables` | Variable[] | - | Workflow variables and context. |\n| `permissions` | PermissionConfig | - | User permissions for editing/executing. |\n| `autoSave` | boolean | true | Auto-save workflow changes. |",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "Workflow",
        "section": "API / Props",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { Workflow } from '@my-corp/workflow';\n\nconst ApprovalWorkflow = () => {\n  const nodes = [\n    { id: '1', type: 'start', label: 'Request Submitted' },\n    { id: '2', type: 'approval', label: 'Manager Approval', assignee: 'manager@company.com' },\n    { id: '3', type: 'decision', label: 'Budget Check', condition: 'amount > 10000' },\n    { id: '4', type: 'approval', label: 'CFO Approval', assignee: 'cfo@company.com' },\n    { id: '5', type: 'action', label: 'Process Payment', action: 'processPayment' },\n    { id: '6', type: 'end', label: 'Complete' }\n  ];\n\n  const edges = [\n    { from: '1', to: '2' },\n    { from: '2', to: '3', condition: 'approved' },\n    { from: '3', to: '4', condition: 'true' },\n    { from: '3', to: '5', condition: 'false' },\n    { from: '4', to: '5', condition: 'approved' },\n    { from: '5', to: '6' }\n  ];\n\n  return (\n    <Workflow\n      nodes={nodes}\n      edges={edges}\n      editable={true}\n      onExecute={async (workflow) => await executeWorkflow(workflow)}\n      executionHistory={pastExecutions}\n      autoSave={true}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "Workflow",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",
        "description": "",
        "filename": "Component List.md",
        "uploadDate": "2025-11-25T03:57:55.450Z",
        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { NotificationCenter } from '@my-corp/notifications';\n\nconst App = () => {\n  const categories = [\n    { id: 'system', label: 'System', color: 'blue' },\n    { id: 'alerts', label: 'Alerts', color: 'red' },\n    { id: 'updates', label: 'Updates', color: 'green' }\n  ];\n\n  return (\n    <NotificationCenter\n      position=\"top-right\"\n      autoClose={3000}\n      categories={categories}\n      showHistory={true}\n      realTime={true}\n      onNotificationClick={(notif) => navigate(notif.link)}\n      onActionClick={(action, notif) => {\n        if (action.type === 'approve') {\n          handleApproval(notif.id);\n        }\n      }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "NotificationCenter",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",
        "documentId": "1764043075450",
        "title": "Component List",

      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `columns` | Column[] | required | Column definitions including field, header, width, sortable, filterable. |\n| `data` | any[] | [] | The data array to display. |\n| `onSort` | (field: string, direction: 'asc' \\| 'desc') => void | - | Callback fired when column sort changes. |\n| `onFilter` | (filters: FilterState) => void | - | Callback fired when filters are applied. |\n| `onSelectionChange` | (selectedRows: any[]) => void | - | Callback when row selection changes. |\n| `selectionMode` | 'single' \\| 'multiple' \\| 'none' | 'none' | Row selection behavior. |\n| `virtualScroll` | boolean | false | Enable virtual scrolling for performance with large datasets. |\n| `rowHeight` | number | 48 | Height of each row in pixels. |\n| `loading` | boolean | false | Show loading overlay. |\n| `emptyState` | ReactNode | - | Custom component to show when data is empty. |\n| `pagination` | PaginationConfig | - | Pagination settings including pageSize, currentPage, total. |\n| `stickyHeader` | boolean | true | Keep header fixed while scrolling. |\n| `expandable` | ExpandableConfig | - | Configuration for expandable rows. |",

      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `schema` | FormSchema | required | The form schema defining fields, validation, and layout. |\n| `initialValues` | Record<string, any> | {} | Initial form values. |\n| `onSubmit` | (values: any) => void \\| Promise<void> | required | Form submission handler. |\n| `onChange` | (values: any, field: string) => void | - | Called when any field value changes. |\n| `validationMode` | 'onSubmit' \\| 'onChange' \\| 'onBlur' | 'onSubmit' | When to trigger validation. |\n| `layout` | 'vertical' \\| 'horizontal' \\| 'inline' | 'vertical' | Form layout orientation. |\n| `autoSave` | AutoSaveConfig | - | Auto-save configuration with debounce time. |\n| `steps` | StepConfig[] | - | Configuration for multi-step forms. |\n| `conditionalLogic` | ConditionalRule[] | - | Rules for showing/hiding fields based on values. |\n| `submitText` | string | 'Submit' | Text for submit button. |\n| `loading` | boolean | false | Show loading state on submit button. |\n| `disabled` | boolean | false | Disable entire form. |",

    {
      "content": "```jsx\nimport { FileUploader } from '@my-corp/ui';\n\nconst DocumentUpload = () => {\n  const handleUpload = async (files) => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    files.forEach(file => formData.append('files', file));\n    return await uploadToServer(formData);\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <FileUploader\n      accept=\".pdf,.doc,.docx\"\n      multiple={true}\n      maxSize={10485760} // 10MB\n      maxFiles={5}\n      onUpload={handleUpload}\n      onProgress={(progress) => console.log(`${progress.percent}%`)}\n      chunked={true}\n      validator={(file) => {\n        if (!file.name.match(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\\./)) {\n          return 'Filename must be alphanumeric';\n        }\n        return null;\n      }}\n    />\n  );\n};\n```\n\n---",
      "metadata": {
        "component_name": "FileUploader",
        "section": "Usage Example",
        "source": "internal_docs",

        "size": 16101
      }
    },
    {
      "content": "| Property | Type | Default | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `accept` | string | '*' | Accepted file types (e.g., 'image/*', '.pdf,.docx'). |\n| `multiple` | boolean | false | Allow multiple file selection. |\n| `maxSize` | number | - | Maximum file size in bytes. |\n| `maxFiles` | number | - | Maximum number of files allowed. |\n| `onUpload` | (files: File[]) => Promise<UploadResult[]> | required | Upload handler function. |\n| `onProgress` | (progress: ProgressEvent) => void | - | Upload progress callback. |\n| `onError` | (error: Error) => void | - | Error handler. |\n| `chunked` | boolean | false | Enable chunked upload for large files. |\n| `chunkSize` | number | 1048576 | Chunk size in bytes (default 1MB). |\n| `preview` | boolean | true | Show file previews for images. |\n| `dragDropArea` | boolean | true | Show drag-and-drop area. |\n| `uploadButton` | ReactNode | - | Custom upload button. |\n| `validator` | (file: File) => string \\| null | - | Custom file validation function. |",
      "metadata": {

  "formatted": "查询: 所有可用组件列表\n回答: BizUserTable\nChartLibrary\nDashboard\nDataGrid\nFileUploader\nFormBuilder\nMyButton\nNotificationCenter\nWorkflow\n来源数量: 27"

messages.content:
根据组件库文档，目前一共有 **9个** 可用的内部组件：

1. **BizUserTable** - 专门用于显示用户数据的高级表格组件，包含内置搜索、分页和角色格式化功能
2. **ChartLibrary** - 综合图表组件，支持多种图表类型（线图、柱图、饼图、散点图、热力图等）
3. **Dashboard** - 仪表板布局组件，支持拖拽式组件排列和响应式网格系统
4. **DataGrid** - 强大灵活的数据网格组件，具有排序、过滤、列调整、行选择和虚拟滚动等高级功能
5. **FileUploader** - 文件上传组件，支持拖拽上传、多文件选择、预览生成、进度跟踪和验证
6. **FormBuilder** - 动态表单构建器，可从模式定义生成表单，包含内置验证、条件字段和多步骤表单
7. **MyButton** - 标准按钮组件，符合内部设计系统的品牌色彩方案，支持加载状态
8. **NotificationCenter** - 集中式通知管理组件，支持实时更新、分类、过滤和操作处理
9. **Workflow** - 可视化工作流构建器和执行器，用于创建和管理多步骤业务流程

这些组件涵盖了从基础UI元素到复杂业务功能的各个方面，为开发提供了完整的组件生态系统。
